team.title: Team Introduction & Vision
team.missionContent: By integrating AR, AI, and robotics technology, systematically solve the structural crisis in the global labor market, build a next-generation human-machine collaboration platform, and unleash the potential of "super individuals".
team.visionContent: Become the world's leading human-machine collaboration technology provider, enabling everyone to enhance their capabilities through technology and create greater value.
team.valuesContent: "Do Good with Good", technological equality, and empowering everyone with technology.
team.foundingStory: WarkAI was founded on a simple yet profound insight: the global labor market is facing an unprecedented structural crisis. Aging populations, skill mismatches, and employment difficulties for people with disabilities are becoming increasingly severe, while traditional solutions can no longer meet the needs. We believe that by organically combining AR, AI, and robotics technology, we can create a completely new human-machine collaboration platform that not only solves the current labor crisis but also unleashes everyone's potential and creates "super individuals".
team.founderDesc: Former Huawei executive with 15 years of experience in the technology industry, having led multiple large-scale technology projects.
team.arCtoDesc: AR technology expert, former senior engineer at Amazon, with multiple AR-related patents.
team.aiLeadDesc: Senior AI expert, PhD from UCLA, has held technical leadership positions at multiple top technology companies.
team.modelLeadDesc: Large model R&D expert, PhD from Imperial College London, with extensive experience in NLP and multimodal models.
team.appLeadDesc: Senior software architect with over 10 years of mobile application development experience, expert in cross-platform architecture design.
team.selfResearchModelDesc: Vertical domain large models based on DeepSeek-R1, optimized for specific scenarios such as textiles and cold chain.
team.hardwareSoftwareDesc: Full-stack self-developed and integrated capabilities from hardware to OS platform, ensuring system compatibility and stability.
team.dataLoopDesc: Continuously acquire first-person perspective data through application scenarios, continuously optimize AI models, and form positive feedback.
team.hardwareCostDesc: Leveraging Shenzhen Huaqiangbei supply chain advantages to achieve high cost-effectiveness
team.laborShortageDesc: Improve production efficiency through human-machine collaboration and alleviate labor shortage issues
team.silverEmploymentDesc: Help elderly people return to work and alleviate social pension pressure
team.disabilityEmploymentDesc: Create equal employment opportunities for people with disabilities and increase social inclusivity
team.esgInvestmentDesc: The project has significant social value and meets ESG investment standards
team.foundedDesc: WarkAI Technology Co., Ltd. officially established, establishing the core philosophy of "Do Good with Good".
team.productDevelopmentDesc: Completed textile AI platform and AR glasses prototype development, reached cooperation with benchmark customers such as Atour and Hilton.
team.scaleExpansionDesc: Cover 50 cities nationwide, launch 2.0 version hardware, enter Japanese market.
team.internationalizationDesc: Enter the US market, establish global R&D centers, complete Series B financing.
team.ecoConstructionDesc: Build "Super Individual AI Operating System (WarkAI OS)" ecosystem, explore brain-computer interfaces, prepare for IPO.

technology.title: WarkAI OS Core Technology & AI Platform
